org.factcenter.qilin.protocols

Interface BulkOT.SplitSender

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProtocolParty
    Enclosing interface:
    BulkOT

    public static interface BulkOT.SplitSender
extends ProtocolParty
    An interface that allows the user to split the writing and reading phases of the send operation. This can be useful to reduce waiting times when several send/receive operations occur sequentially. This assumes the writing phase occurs before the reading phase (if not, there is no point in implementing this interface).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BulkOT.SplitSender.State

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void sendReadingPhase(BulkOT.SplitSender.State state)
      Completes the send operation initiated by sendWritingPhase(BitMatrix, BitMatrix).
      BulkOT.SplitSender.State sendWritingPhase(BitMatrix x0, BitMatrix x1)
      Initiate the split send operation (this phase should perform writes to the comm channel but no reads).

      • Methods inherited from interface org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.ProtocolParty

        init, setParameters

    • Method Detail

      • sendWritingPhase

        BulkOT.SplitSender.State sendWritingPhase(BitMatrix x0,
                                          BitMatrix x1)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Initiate the split send operation (this phase should perform writes to the comm channel but no reads). To complete the operation, the user must call sendReadingPhase(org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.BulkOT.SplitSender.State) with the state returned by this method call.
        Parameters:
        x0 -
        x1 -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendReadingPhase

        void sendReadingPhase(BulkOT.SplitSender.State state)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Completes the send operation initiated by sendWritingPhase(BitMatrix, BitMatrix).
        Parameters:
        state - the return value given by sendWritingPhase(BitMatrix, BitMatrix).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
